trans-unit.source: Represents an SSPI security token.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SspiSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the groups to which the Windows accounts belong are extracted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Windows 계정이 속한 그룹이 추출 되; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unauthenticated (anonymous) callers are allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>인증 되지 않은 (익명) 호출자가 허용 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SspiSecurityToken"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if NTLM authentication is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>NTLM 인증 허용 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>.
Gets a value that indicates whether to allow NTLM authentication.
trans-unit.target: NTLM 인증 허용 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` allows authentication to downgrade to NTLM if Kerberos is not available.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 `true` Kerberos를 사용할 수 없는 경우 NTLM으로 다운 그레이드 하는 인증을 허용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` causes [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to make a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 `false` 하면 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] NTLM을 사용 하는 경우 예외를 throw 하는 최상의 노력에 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 확인 `false` 네트워크를 통해 전송 되지 NTLM 자격 증명을 방해 하지 않을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if NTLM authentication is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>NTLM 인증 허용 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to allow anonymous callers.
trans-unit.target: 익명 호출자 허용 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if anonymous callers are allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>익명 호출자가 허용 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to extract the groups to which the Windows accounts belong.
trans-unit.target: Windows 계정이 속한 그룹이 추출 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the groups to which the Windows accounts belong are extracted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Windows 계정이 속한 그룹이 추출 되; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the token ID.
The token ID.
Gets the token impersonation level.
The <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.
Gets the network credential.
The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>.
Gets a collection of security keys.
A collection of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
Gets the starting effective date for the token.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the starting effective date for the token.
Gets the expiration date for the token.
trans-unit.target: 토큰에 대 한 만료 날짜를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the expiration date for the token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>토큰에 대 한 만료 날짜를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>
